sentences.en: Computers can handle huge amounts of data.
sentences.cn: 计算机能处理大量数据。

sentences.en: Don't take on more responsibilities than you can handle.
sentences.cn: 不要承担过多的责任。

sentences.en: He began informally to handle Ted's tax affairs for him.
sentences.cn: 他开始非正式地为特德打理税务。

sentences.en: He flew off the handle at the slightest thing.
sentences.cn: 他为一点小事就大发脾气。

sentences.en: He had never handled a weapon before.
sentences.cn: 他以前从未碰过武器。

sentences.en: I handled most of the paperwork.
sentences.cn: 大部分文书工作是我做的。

sentences.en: I knew how to load and handle a gun.
sentences.cn: 我知道怎么上子弹，也知道枪怎么用。

sentences.en: I think I would handle a meeting with Mr. Siegel very badly.
sentences.cn: 我觉得和西格尔先生会谈我可能会搞得一团糟。

sentences.en: I turned the handle and found the door was open.
sentences.cn: 我转了一下门把手，发现门开着。

sentences.en: I was finally able to get a handle on the true nature of the problem.
sentences.cn: 最终我能够理解这个问题的实质

sentences.en: She cannot handle pressure.
sentences.cn: 她承受不了压力。

sentences.en: She had to cling onto the door handle until the pain passed.
sentences.cn: 她只好紧紧握住门把手，直到不疼了才松开。

sentences.en: Some preteens are able to handle a good deal of responsibility.
sentences.cn: 有些青春期前的儿童能够承担很多责任。

sentences.en: Some students have emotional problems that teachers feel ill equipped to handle.
sentences.cn: 一些学生的情感问题令老师们束手无策。

sentences.en: Tents have been set up next to hospitals to handle the overflow.
sentences.cn: 医院旁搭起了帐篷以安置容纳不下的人员。

sentences.en: The case is being handled by a top lawyer.
sentences.cn: 此案正由一位顶尖律师负责处理。

sentences.en: The device is manually operated, using a simple handle.
sentences.cn: 一只普通的手柄就可以手动操作这个装置。

sentences.en: The finance department handles all the accounts.
sentences.cn: 财务部处理所有账目。

sentences.en: The more powerful the car the more difficult it is to handle.
sentences.cn: 汽车的功率越大，就越难驾驭。

sentences.en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentences.cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

sentences.en: Then he turned the handle and went in.
sentences.cn: 然后他转动把手走了进去。

sentences.en: Using a fabric conditioner will make clothes easier to handle and iron.
sentences.cn: 使用织物柔顺剂会使衣服打理、熨烫起来更为容易。

words.tran_cn: 处理者；管理者；拳击教练；（犬马等的）训练者
使用；负责；触摸；指挥（handle的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: get a handle on 或 have a handle on 【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: 扶手；握柄；车顶安全把手
手柄；杠杆手柄；杆式手柄；手柄操纵杆

trans.tran_en: the part of a door that you use for opening it

trans.tran_cn: 应付，处理，使用，驾驶，拿，买，卖
trans.tran_en: to do the things that are necessary to complete a job
to do the things that are necessary to complete a job
